name: Adamancipator Crystal - Dragite
effectText: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Adamancipator" card: You can draw 1 card. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 WATER Synchro Monster you control or in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, place this card on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Adamancipator Crystal - Dragite" once per turn.
